Name: Resilio Sync
Operating system: Windows, OS X, Linux, FreeBSD, Android, iOS

Name: Cobian Backup
Prior file versions, revision control: Backup software with folder synchronization feature

Name: Windows Live Mesh (discontinued 13 February 2013)
Operating system: Windows (Vista and greater), Windows Mobile, OSX

Name: OmniGroup OmniPresence
Operating system: OSX, OmniGroup software for iOS, open source framework available
Remote desktop: {{no}}, via local Time Machine backup only
Prior file versions, revision control: Sync local folders via OmniSync or WebDAV server but not to the server itself
Scheduling: {{no}}, syncs whenever it's online and not paused

Name: Windows Live Sync (discontinued 31 March 2011)
Prior file versions, revision control: Sync folders, browse devices from website, remote access
